effect.black-white: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages.
effect.black-2-white-2: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages.

short_effect.black-white: Lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.
short_effect.black-2-white-2: Lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.

flavor_text.black-white: The user attacks the target at full power. The attack’s recoil harshly reduces the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The user attacks the target at full power. The attack’s recoil harshly reduces the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
